definition: to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
to tax one's mind and body/demanding (work)/dedicated (worker)/hard-working
lit. the kindness of recognizing sb's worth and employing him (idiom)/patronage/protection
making an all-out effort (idiom); to try one's heart out/to do one's utmost
lit. not for the monk's sake but for the Buddha's sake (idiom)/fig. (to do sth for sb) out of deference to sb else
pinyin: bu4 kan4 seng1 mian4 kan4 fo2 mian4

definition: lit. to work like an ox, to work like a horse; fig. to work extremely hard
loyal and devoted (idiom); faithful and true
to display utter loyalty/to be loyal to the end
to atone for one's crimes by meritorious acts
lit. to kill the donkey when the grinding is done (idiom)/to get rid of sb once he has ceased to be useful
